meanings.definition: The act of preparing something for winter.
meanings.sent1: Our winterizations of the house included insulating the windows and doors.
meanings.sent2: The winterizations of the car involved changing to snow tires and adding antifreeze.
meanings.sent3: Dad's winterizations of the backyard involved putting up a snowman family.
meanings.sent4: The winterizations of the cabin transformed it into a cozy winter retreat.
meanings.sent5: Proper winterizations can help protect your plants from the cold.

meanings.definition: The process of making something suitable for winter conditions.
meanings.sent1: The winterizations of the playground included adding a layer of soft padding under the equipment.
meanings.sent2: Proper winterizations of the house can help conserve energy during the colder months.
meanings.sent3: The winterizations of the ski resort involved grooming the slopes for optimal snow conditions.
meanings.sent4: Her winterizations of the wardrobe involved bringing out the cozy sweaters and scarves.
meanings.sent5: Effective winterizations of your home can keep you warm and comfortable all season long.
